# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(sense-steam STATIC 
  stik_input_driver.c
  stik_input_manager.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(sense-steam)

target_include_directories(sense-steam PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(sense-steam PUBLIC 
  sense
  steam-input
  imprint)
